# **GGplot**

```{r}
levels(heart$Outcome) <- c(0, 1)

ggplot(heart, aes(x=StressLevel, y= ST_Depression, size = Outcome)) +
    geom_point(alpha=0.1) +
    scale_size(range = c(0, 1))
```

## **Interpretation of Bar Plot Visualization**

# **GGPlot**

```{r}
ggplot(heart, aes(x=StressLevel, y=ST_Depression, size=Outcome)) + 
    geom_point(color="darkred") +
    ggtitle("Size")
```
